select bss.* from bill_stock_scrap bss inner join bill_stock_scrap_line bssl on bssl.scrap_id = bss.id inner join stock s on s.id = bssl.stock_id
bss.deleted = 0
and s.sn like concat('%', #{request.stockSn}, '%')
and bss.serial_no like concat('%', #{request.serialNo}, '%')
and bss.created_time between #{request.startCreatedTime} and #{request.endCreatedTime}
group by bss.id ORDER BY bss.id desc
